alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:25PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sierra County through 200 PM MDT... At 125 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Winston, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sierra County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
